title: Final Examination Routine
content: Final examination routine for the academic year 2081 has been published. Please check the notice board for more details.

title: Parents Meeting
content: Parents meeting will be held on 2025-01-04. All the parents are requested to attend the meeting.

title: Holiday Notice
content: School will remain closed on 2025-01-05 due to public holiday. Regular classes will resume from 2025-01-06.

title: Scholarship Notice
content: Scholarship notice for the academic year 2081 has been published. Please check the notice board for more details.

title: School Reopening
content: School will reopen from 2025-01-06. All the students are requested to attend the school regularly.

title: Sports Meet
content: Sports meet will be held on 2025-01-07 to 2025-01-09. All the students are requested to participate in the event.

title: Notice for Class 10 Students
content: Class 10 students are requested to collect their admit card from the school office. Please bring your ID card.

title: Midterm Examination Schedule
content: Midterm examination schedule for the academic year 2081 has been released. Please check the notice board for details.

title: Quiz Competition
content: A quiz competition will be held on 2025-01-10. All interested students are requested to register by 2025-01-08.

title: Science Exhibition
content: The annual science exhibition will be held on 2025-01-15. Students are encouraged to participate and showcase their projects.

title: Cultural Fest
content: The school cultural fest will be held on 2025-01-20. Students can participate in various cultural activities.

title: Winter Break Notice
content: School will remain closed for winter break from 2025-01-25 to 2025-02-05. Classes will resume from 2025-02-06.

title: Summer Vacation
content: School will be closed for summer vacation from 2025-02-10 to 2025-02-28. Regular classes will resume from 2025-03-01.

title: Teacher Training Program
content: A teacher training program will be conducted from 2025-01-15 to 2025-01-20. All teachers are requested to attend.

title: New Admission Notice
content: Admissions for the academic year 2082 are now open. Interested parents can collect the admission forms from the school office.

title: PTA Meeting
content: The next PTA meeting will be held on 2025-02-01. All parents are requested to attend.

title: Mock Examination
content: Mock examinations for Class 10 will be held from 2025-02-05 to 2025-02-10. Students are advised to prepare accordingly.

title: Unit Test Schedule
content: Unit tests for all classes will be conducted from 2025-02-15 to 2025-02-20. Please check the notice board for the detailed schedule.

title: Independence Day Celebration
content: Independence day will be celebrated on 2025-02-25. Students are encouraged to participate in various activities.

title: Notice for Class 10 Students
content: Class 10 students are requested to collect their admit card from the school office. Please bring your ID card.

title: Annual Day Celebration
content: The school annual day celebration will be held on 2025-03-01. Students can participate in various cultural programs.

title: Holiday Notice
content: School will remain closed on 2025-03-02 due to public holiday. Regular classes will resume from 2025-03-03.

title: Notice for Class 12 Students
content: Class 8-10 students are requested to collect their admit card from the school office. Please bring your ID card.

title: Annual Sports Day
content: The annual sports day will be held on 2025-03-05. Students are encouraged to participate in various sports events.

title: Winter Break Notice
content: School will remain closed for winter break from 2025-01-25 to 2025-02-05. Classes will resume from 2025-02-06.

title: Summer Vacation
content: School will be closed for summer vacation from 2025-02-10 to 2025-02-28. Regular classes will resume from 2025-03-01.

title: Teacher Training Program
content: A teacher training program will be conducted from 2025-01-15 to 2025-01-20. All teachers are requested to attend.

title: New Admission Notice
content: Admissions for the academic year 2082 are now open. Interested parents can collect the admission forms from the school office.

title: PTA Meeting
content: The next PTA meeting will be held on 2025-02-01. All parents are requested to attend.

title: Mock Examination
content: Mock examinations for Class 10 will be held from 2025-02-05 to 2025-02-10. Students are advised to prepare accordingly.

title: Unit Test Schedule
content: Unit tests for all classes will be conducted from 2025-02-15 to 2025-02-20. Please check the notice board for the detailed schedule.
